LJCSections.summary: Represents a collection of Section objects.
LJCSections.remarks:
The LJCSections is the top level class for the GenData object tree.

GenData is the XML data format for the data that is merged with a text template file to generate a customized output file. 

				LJCSections

					LJCSection

						LJCItems

							LJCItem

								LJCReplacements

									LJCReplacement

CreateColumnData.summary: Creates the data from a table definition.

AddReplacement.summary: Adds a Replacement to an Item.

Deserialize.summary: Deserializes the data from a Sections XML file.

DeserializeString.summary: Deserializes the data from a Sections XML string.

CreateSections.summary: Creates the Section data from an XMLDoc node.

Serialize.summary: Serializes the data to an XML file.

Add.summary: Adds an object and key value.
Add.param: The object to be added to the collection.

Get.summary: Get the item by Key value.
Get.param: Indicates if an error should be thrown if the key is not found.
Get.returns: The object with the matching key value.

HasKey.summary: Indicates if a key already exists.
HasKey.returns: True if the key already exists, otherwise false.
